sec-benchmarking-ai-overview-54d0.explanation: Understand, optimize, and ensure application health.
Reduce costs, optimize performance, save the planet.
FLOPS measure deep learning model efficiency and speed.
Poor performance hinders model adoption and value.
Larger models learn more complex patterns.
Faster training, better performance, less resource usage.
Focus on code paths, not just execution time.
